title: PreSonus VU Meter v1.0.0.34268 for StudioOne-R2R [deepstatus]
description:
PreSonus VU Meter v1.0.0.34268 for StudioOne-R2R [deepstatus]

PreSonus have announced a cool little free plug-in PreSonus VU Meter.

The VU Meter plug-in provides the best of both worlds for your signal metering needs: Analog-style VU meters (with clip indicators), and LED-segment-style peak meters. VU meters are most useful for showing overall signal level, and peak meters (akin to the channel meters in the Studio One Console) are most useful for keeping track of peak signal levels. By referencing both of these, you can see a more nuanced picture of your signalÃ¢â‚¬â€overall level and peak level.

A stereo correlation meter rounds out the trio, giving you insight into the left/right phase relationship of your signal.

This free standalone VU Meter plug-in is made from the same components used in the Channel Strip Collection.

One nice feature is that it offers pre fader metering. We also love the micro mode on each channel.


FOR WIN/MAC


Installation:


Only works under R2R patched StudiOne release.
